sorcer.service

Interface Service

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncExertion, Concatenator, Exertion, GroupManagement, Jobber, Outer, Partner, Provider, RemotePartner, SorcerNotifierProtocol, Spacer, Tasker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountProvider, AltExertion, AntTask, Block, ContextTask, EvaluationTask, ExertMonitor, Job, LoopExertion, NetBlock, NetJob, NetTask, ObjectBlock, ObjectJob, ObjectTask, OptExertion, ServiceCataloger, ServiceConcatenator, ServiceExertion, ServiceJobber, ServiceProvider, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker, SignedServiceTask, StaticServiceProvider, Task

    public interface Service
    An top-level common interface for all service peers in SORCER. Each service accepts a request for Exertion to exert the federation of collaborating services.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Exertion service(Exertion exertion, Transaction txn)
      A generic service request as specified by an exertion - a generic service message.

    • Method Detail

      • service

        Exertion service(Exertion exertion,
               Transaction txn)
                 throws TransactionException,
                        ExertionException,
                        RemoteException
        A generic service request as specified by an exertion - a generic service message. It can be carried out dynamically and indirectly by any Service peer and directly by a Service matching the exertion's method Signature.
        Parameters:
        exertion - an input exertion
        txn - The transaction (if any) under which to provide service.
        Returns:
        a resulting exertion
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a transaction error occurs
        ExertionException - if an exertion invocation failed for any reason
        RemoteException
